featured.text: The plant was considered sacred by the ancient Aztecs, and modern-day Mexicans eat it, drink it, and even use it in medicines and shampoos.

definition.zh_def: 墨西哥人，指來自墨西哥或具有墨西哥國籍的人。
definition.en_def: Mexicans are people from Mexico or of Mexican descent.
definition.example: Many Mexicans celebrate their independence day with parades and festivals.
